name: The Choice
description:
A Solution Exists.
A game for the #GameZanga 7 jam. Theme: "You always have a choice".

Full Screen Recommended (button on the bottom-right corner)
If loading is taking a while, it is because of music. Please blame Beethoven :D.

Controls (support Touch too):
Left Mouse Button - Interact
Arrows/WASD - Move
Z - Options Menu

Please follow Pixel Pyramid Games on Facebook :)

Audio Credits:
Moonlight, by Beethoven.
Rain, by The Relaxed Guy.
Morse Code
Door Slam
Door Knock
Shock
